name: Mr.Robot vs Enemy Bot
description:
These characters can be used in any side-scrolling game as the main character or even as an enemy. All character parts are made in AI and EPS files so that can be edited easily using Adobe illustrator software or any vector software, with many parts of the body there have the opportunity to add and refine the movement following the game needed. The animation uses Dragonbones Pro. The PNG files are separated transparent and each animation is collected in folders

Sample Animation here
